Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 107th overall pick, by Houston in 2016...
Was claimed off waivers by New York on 4/17/2018.
Injured on 5/17/2019 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Traded from New York to Houston on 2/25/2020 (Going to HOU: P Charles Barney, 3B Manuel Santoro. Going to NY: P Luis Cabello, SS Joseph Defoor, P Abel Blanco)...
Injured on 6/29/2020 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/10/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $800,000 per year...
Injured on 5/22/2023 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
